mention.text: a couple critically injured in a natural-gas explosion in their home two years ago
Jerry Sickmeier , 33 , and Lisa Jines , 26 , $ 10 million in damages and $ 1.5 million for medical expenses
the Dec. 7 , 1986 , explosion at their home in Cahokia , a St. Louis suburb
their home in Cahokia , a St. Louis suburb
third-degree burns that covered most of his body
